family.title: â¤ï¸ Family Focus
family.suggestion: Jones loves Blaze and the Monster Machines â€” do a 'monster truck race' in the backyard together. Set up cushions as obstacles and race toy trucks. Jett can watch from his blanket nearby.
family.conversationStarter: Ask Jillian: 'What's the best thing you've read recently? Any book keeping you up at night?'
family.weeklyGoal: Sunday Sweet Breakfast tradition â€” make pancakes together as a family this Sunday. Get Jones involved mixing ingredients.
family.potencyAction: Acknowledge what happened without defending: 'You're right, I shouldn't have...'
family.reflection: The relationship temperature is critical right now. Focus on repair, not defense. Create space for Jillian to express frustrations without trying to fix everything. Be present â€” not just physically, but emotionally.
